title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.4 - Fictitious arrangements prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.4 - Fictitious arrangements prohibited

State Regulations

No insurer shall, without the approval of the superintendent, sell insurance pursuant to a mass merchandising plan to members of any association or organization formed principally for the purpose of obtaining such insurance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
13.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
